alert.note: Alert for Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 1:25PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Craven, southeastern Beaufort and northwestern Pamlico Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 125 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Olympia, or near James City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Bern, James City, Ransomville, Askins, Cayton, Olympia, Edward, Grantsboro, Royal, Bonnerton, Core Point, South Creek, Bayview, Fairfield Harbour, Aurora Ferry Terminal, Bayview Ferry Terminal, Coastal Carolina Regional Airport, Alliance, Aurora and Bridgeton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
